data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. Temperatures will remain relatively low in the morning, and the weather will be mainly fine. With the monsoon being replaced by an easterly airstream, temperatures will rise progressively over the coast of southern China in the middle and latter parts of this week. The weather will become humid. The northeast monsoon is expected to affect southern China during the weekend. It will become cool over the region in the following couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260202","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 later.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods at first.
